response.overview: Starting from 2020, COVID-19 infectious diseases broke out all over the country, with Wuhan in Hubei Province as the hardest hit area. On a special day with wind and snow, Chen Huiying and her family returned to their hometown in Hubei (Hongtu Township) to accompany the elderly for the Spring Festival. At this moment, many roads in Hubei Province were closed, people could not get in and out-effectively prevented and controlled the spread of this epidemic. Almost everyone in this little township were trapped here, workers therefore had no option but to stay at home. Overwhelming news of COVID-19 came from TV news and Internets. The number of infections and deaths rose sharply with all-day live broadcasting. Accompanied by fear and anxiety, repeated the usual ordinary state of life, and children seeded the only fun in the enclosed space. As days passed, everyone looked forward to having a safe environment for their families and waited to the situation of the epidemic to improve.
response.title: Southern Wind
